website_summaries.verdict: A powerhouse that's built for heavy duty cutting jobs – by far the best router table on today's market.
pros: A solid table with reliable craftsmanship noticeable in every feature – steel construction, easy-moving fence, and clear assembly instructions
Includes accessory bundle with stable castors
cons: The fence is a bit difficult to assemble
Expensive – but the included accessories make it worth the price
It's also heavy, but the castors make up for this concern

customer_reviews.title: Nice stable table.
customer_reviews.text: After many years of working with a small portable router table this was a much needed upgrade. Assembly was very straight forward and simple. I highly recommend getting the Kreg PRS3000 lift with this table. I use it in conjunction with the INCRA MTL2 joint guides to cut box joints. The plastic measure guides slide right into the fence rai without any problem and stay in place while cutting multiple joints. I only wish the dust collection hose adapter was a little better. It has a tendency to unclip when adjusting the fence. When cutting box joints this is a bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Wiedrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice but with flaws...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly happy with the fence but: The four bolts that secure the FENCE EXTRUSION to the CLAMP BLOCK ASSEMBLY only catch by 2-3 threads. As a result, one of the screws stripped out while tightening it, the others I’ve only tightened slightly for fear that they will strip out also. As a result, the fence has some play and gets out of square with respect to the table until it's locked down...I have to check end-to-end square with each adjustment (probably a good idea anyway)! Also, when the out-feed FENCE FACE is extend out fully to the left, the T-knobs interfere with the Fence-lock handle, necessitating the use of a screwdriver to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddletown

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my router table and got it assembled. It was very easy to do, as the parts were separated and clearly identified. The instructions were also very easy to follow. The mobile stand feels very solid and sturdy. The casters lock/unlock easily. Joining the tabletop to the base is straight forward as well. I have not drilled the top plate yet for my particular router, but directions seem easy enough. Hopefully I'll get it finished tomorrow. All in all, it seems like a quality product that will hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: WRG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product, but should include a dust collection box.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and functioning product, though that is good, it desperately needs additional dust collection under the table surrounding the router motor. Kreg could easily design this system with dust collection around the router motor and with that, be miles ahead of their competition. Hope this spurs on the intellect at Kreg...........
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: good for beginner like me, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: but it won't last, too much plastic and mdf. I bought the kit, you get useful accessories like the set of measuring bars, and casters. some hardware is bad. the four screws to attach the fence to the rail are too short and strip the thread, they are only 5/8" long should be 3/4". some pre-drilled holes in the table are misaligned. I also bought their lift, it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fence with used with the Kreg router table top
customer_reviews.text: The Kreg fence slides in an extruded aluminum track at the infeed side of the table, and locks with a 1/4 turn handle at the outfeed end. Once you have it correctly adjusted, it slides easily with little or no racking, and a fine-adjustment wheel lets you adjust the fence inward or outward in millimeters. If you're building a cabinet to support the Kreg router table top and fence, be aware that you'll need a minimum of 1-1/4" overhang on the infeed side, and 1-3/4" on the outfeed side to clear the fence mounting and locking mechanisms.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Board came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Second of some Kreg products i bought together that came damaged, pretty disappointed for the cost. 8" Scale on side is supposed to be a friction fit. More of a slip fit, will have to shim it. Getting the nylon screws just right is tricky, as the ends aren't tapered off or finished in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Quality stable table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Assembly was straightforward. All the parts and components were included. I would recommend buying this in the packaged 'kit' form as it is here. I debated just buying the top and base separately and adding the other options later. I am happy that I spent the money to get it all at once. It is a very nice router table. The locking casters are very sturdy and provide a stable work table when locked. I would purchase again. One caveat: If you plan to use this table with a Jessem router lift, you will need to replace the corner pads that come with this tablekit with those from Jessem ( about $20).
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOOL! with all the accessories makes this a ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TOOL! with all the accessories makes this a bargain. The stand was easy to put together, but the fence assembly was a little challenging. Mounting your router also takes time and understanding. If you take your time to understand how it works then you will get great results. This table is worth the money, it may seem expensive, but it does everything you would want in a router table, stays true and the fence works with ease.The casters mounted to the table is the way to go. They are quality casters and each wheel locks the table in place, no movement while using the table.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good general purpose router table
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4.5 stars. Easy to assemble except for the 'rulers' which are tricky to set true.. The only shortcoming in my experience is that the fence doesn't track parallel easily. It needs to be checked fore and aft following a move or reset.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions,  quality product
customer_reviews.text: When I hear KREG I hear quality. Assembly is required when this arrives at your door, very easy to follow instructions. I had bought the stand, table top, and fence. Probably took about 2 hours to put everything together, this included running to the hardware store to get longer screws to secure my Milwaukee router to the table top. There are so many manufacturers of routers there is no way anyone can expect KREG to provide the specific screws to secure your router to the table top. I needed to put a V groove in beadboard. I was very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beetle

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanting this router table for a year but it is hard to let go of $500 and still buy a router and lift in the end I spent $1,300 in all. It is heavy gage metal and the bolts are chrome plated witch will not rust. I am happy with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Allan G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks lost in transit in New Zealand, this router table was well worth the wait. It was easy to assemble and is sturdy as, even with the optional castors in place of the adjustable feet. It has all the features I was looking for and a couple more. I have it set up with the Kreg router lift and a Bosch router but, from the instructions, it looks as though it'd be easy to set up with a wide range of routers and/or lifts.
customer_reviews.author: Toadguts

customer_reviews.title: Kreg is a top line product.
customer_reviews.text: Kreg is the highest of quality. Maybe a few extra dollars of initial investment but more than worth it, This table is sturdy and solid. Parts were clearly marked and instructions were easy to follow. I have waited years to make the purchase of a router table and can not think of anything else it could have.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffsusan

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding, stout table and very well engineered. Kreg customer support has been most excellent too! A lot of other US companies could learn a thing or two from these guys! Thank you Kreg!!!
customer_reviews.author: capt.cm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, assembly was straight forward. I needed to match some cabinet doors and this and the correct bits has made the job easier. If you don't have a router table this is it, unless you can afford a shaper.
customer_reviews.author: douglas f. layton

customer_reviews.title: Cost vs fence clamping system seems somewhat inadequate. Better clamping would be a great improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and stable which is very good. Router mounting with undrilled plate is OK, but would be better if additional router markings were included for drilling. This could be accomplished with additional markings on mounting plate or tracing paper.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Birky

customer_reviews.title: Kreg router table kit
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a lot. Over studied and decided to treat myself. Absolutely fabulous. Also saw several utube vid's on making a dust collection box and storage area below. Going to start on that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it was always square. Have had a rockler product for years and it was fine but I did find it hard to keep square to the bit. Not an issue with this one. Plan to add microadjuster as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terry A. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Kreg router table
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough about Kreg products. This is the best bang for your buck. All quality material and workmanship. Customer service is the best. I would not hesitate to buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: George J. Probst

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This table is fantastic. It is flat, large enough for cabinetry + bulky jigs, and has a GREAT fence. I did not purchase it with the extra set of options – big mistake. I ended up buying almost all of them over time. So much better than the one it replaces! Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Table
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. Took a little time to assemble and drilling the mounting holes for my Milwaukee router took some patience but in the end everything came out just fine. I am a true beginner when it comes to routing so very pleased with the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Albers

customer_reviews.title: Fit pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it and it should work as designed. Everything went together and aligns perfectly. I will add an update when it is used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bolts and screws are very soft metal.
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because the bolts for assembly are very soft and strip easily. Some of the pieces are cheaply made...the micro tuner, for instance. Other then that, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Null99

customer_reviews.title: I checked with Kreg because I couldn't figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: I checked with Kreg because I couldn't figure out how to install Micro Adjuster and they stated that the Micro-Adjuster provided does not fit fence PRS 1015, it is for an older model router fence.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Obvious quality, it comes at a price but if you want an item to work correctly the first time and not need constant fussing with adjustments, this is worth it. One hardware item was bad and I broke another, a quick phone call brought replacements the next day. Excellent understanding and service from Kreg.
customer_reviews.author: BerkshireBear

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lift for a couple of weeks now and really enjoy it. It is made extremely well and is very accurate. I like how I can change routers and the lift can adapt to seemingly any of them. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great product...horrible shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow...they completely destroyed this thing in shipping. I get that its heavy, but seriously? There were parts that were not even in their original container boxes when it arrived. What a mess...thanks UPS!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bach

customer_reviews.title: careful installing the top
customer_reviews.text: When installing the top to the support, Kreg supplies a pack of screws and the special bit - these are the only two items in the bag- however, the screws they supply are too long and protrude through the table top surface. Why they supply screws that length is beyond me. I now have 4 holes in my brand new tabletop! I sent a message to Kreg and heard nothing in reply.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schuchart

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding router table. Top quality well engineered. Excellent dust collection integrated into the excellent fence. I bought the Bosch 1617EVS for this table and connecting it to the router top was a breeze. Couldn't be happier. Is it worth the money? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the Triton plunge router and it is a great combination. The table is easy to put together and is very precise. This kit comes with everything you need except the Triton mounting plate to make the solution complete.
customer_reviews.author: Mitry F. Deeb

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the stand with casters so I ordered it It wasn’t until it arrived and the casters were missing when I read in the full product description. the very last sentence read casters not included. Fix your damn picture to reflect this. Kreg stuff costs enough anyway without having to buy a set of casters.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Burrill

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good but over priced for what it is, cheap materials used for
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Large workspace
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this router table. Large workspace. I’ve only used it once since I set it up, but it worked fantastic. I only wish the wheel kit was standard and not an option. I quickly realized that I needed to purchase wheels. Assembly wasn’t hard, but did take a while.
customer_reviews.author: Holton Barnwell

customer_reviews.title: The stability of this table is amazing. It was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The stability of this table is amazing. It was super easy to put together. The hardest part was drilling the phenolic mounting plate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Piper

customer_reviews.title: This thing is better than I am
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better than I am. You won't be disappointed. The company was great about a few missing pieces and mailed them right out. It's pricey, but you get everything you pay for in this table.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Great router table
customer_reviews.text: Good table I love kreg products and this table definitely is up to standards
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Morin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace my older craftsman router table. I like that the fence locks down. I have used this more the last month than I ever used my old table in the almost three years I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Noe

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing table. Extremely well built and heavy duty. Does everything advertised. Fence is best I’ve used. Highly recommend it with Triton router. Plans on website for cabinet are also well done.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: great quality and superb instructions
customer_reviews.text: The kit is outstanding. Well made, great quality and superb instructions. I should have bought it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Stand is heavy and very stable. Fence is acceptable. Insert is poor and the reason for the 2 stars. Both the unit that came with the table and the one I bought for the Triton router were warped with a noticeable rise in the center. Alignment was a pain the double screws makes it very difficult for me to get a good alignment.
customer_reviews.author: Thelbert R. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as durable as I had hoped. Top is very cheap, not steel.
customer_reviews.author: todd stroup

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router table.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, much sturdier than I expected. Also much heavier than I expected, but I guess that is why it is sturdy. Would purchase again, but it is built so well I doubt I will ever have to.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: The fence and table are top notch, just follow ...
customer_reviews.text: The fence and table are top notch, just follow the directions carefully. Set-up takes a little time but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Offshore

customer_reviews.title: Kreg is outstanding with customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the router table. It did not come with an insert plate, but one call to Kreg and it was promptly delivered. Excellent customer service was provided by Kreg. Overall was a very good experience.
customer_reviews.author: William L Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I like the fence
customer_reviews.text: Once I put it together I said to myself $500 that's a lot of money. I could have gat a grizzly router table. But I was impressed by the large table top. I run many boards through it. I like the fence, very easy to adjust. 500 is still a lot of money. But I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: derickdove

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: More than satisfied with how well this was made and it's an American made product. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Kreg Router Table Fence
customer_reviews.text: Would give this 5 stars but one of the hardware packages was missing a part.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Sweet router  table
customer_reviews.text: One of the screws blew out the back side of table top. I hope this doesn’t lead to problems due to use. Other than that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Matty B

customer_reviews.title: As usual, Kreg got it right
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean setup. Kreg makes good stuff. This table is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: mike rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Directions could have been a little better but that's the only complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Damage
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with damage on the top of the aluminum fence where the center reading tape mounts. It kept the tape from sticking flush to the surface of the fence, but I don’t believe it will affect the accuracy of the reading.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very solid table
customer_reviews.text: Order was received quickly and the Kreg table is very solid. Feels very well built. Coupled up with a Bosch router the cuts were great quality and wood moved smoothly on the table. The mods are 70% complete.
customer_reviews.author: S. Herhold

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy, precise and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy, precise and versatile. A good start, but it's never enough. I'm now looking to build a dust collection and storage system into it. Note that if you use the included insert plate, you'll need a drill press and to go slowly. The material is easily chipped and bits snag easily on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Andresky

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Got it in and assembled but haven't had a chance to actually use it yet. From what I see it is as advertised and I look forward to using it. I am confident it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Versital and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, the possibilities are endless with a table like this. I mounted a triton router 31/4 hp and the assembly was easy. Highly recommend this for anyone to have in there wood working shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Wow! I love this Thing. Added a Triton router and presto chango set up is easy. Cuts are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Creighton Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and responsive vendor
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. It was shipped in multiple pieces which came at different times which presented a minor challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T. Hirt

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got the one with the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got the one with the bells and whistles. Good tools are worth the extra money. I've already talked two of my friends into one and they love them too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product after using another router table for a number of years. The adjustment is so easy and friendly to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T Clark

customer_reviews.title: Table Fence
customer_reviews.text: It is GREAT and much lighter than the first one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Ed R

customer_reviews.title: Get a good quality router for this table.  I chose a porter cable 3 1/4 hp router and it works great
customer_reviews.text: It's the best router table you can get. The quality is exceptional. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Kreg
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good material, good design. A quality USA made product. Another quality Kreg product. This company may have expensive products but you'll understand why once you buy something of theirs. Outstanding customer service as well. I messaged them that I was missing a package of bolts with my kit, they apologized and sent me a new pack in a few days, no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I really love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I really love this machine, i use it more for joining but it is a very good all round table. Love it
customer_reviews.author: E. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: They need to be made like the stand
customer_reviews.text: The fence could use some improvements. All the plastic parts are going to break with use. They need to be made like the stand. All metal.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Keeping this fence square can be a challenge at first, but in general a good design.
customer_reviews.author: Eoin Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: BEST ROUTER TABLE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cabinets shop and I highly recommend this router table. Nothing else on the market quite like this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Hale

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, east to assemble.  Built the cabinet for it to store the bits.
customer_reviews.text: The precision of the table. Will use it in my work shop.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great router table, great set of accessories!
customer_reviews.text: It is me second Kreg's router table and I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never been so happy with how easy this tool has made my work ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been so happy with how easy this tool has made my work compared to other router tables I’ve used !
customer_reviews.author: Danny Beck

customer_reviews.title: Take your time assembling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product looking forward to putting it to work
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Great job in packaging items together
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Great job in packaging items together. Items quickly shipped. Happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: BruWIN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I added the Kreg Router lift system to the table, its a great addition to my Home Shop.
customer_reviews.author: delton

customer_reviews.title: Great setup - nice fence - unneeded component included
customer_reviews.text: I love this router table - my ONLY concern about this package is that it includes an extra "Micro Adj" part which CANNOT be attached ANYWHERE on the fence as indicated on it's instructions - it was for the older fence - the new fence HAS a micro adjustment already - the additional one is not needed - I am concerned that the package price is increased because of this unneeded piece.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J

customer_reviews.title: Good products
customer_reviews.text: Had a minor problem with the insert, Kreg took care of it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: David Olson

customer_reviews.title: but is a great table
customer_reviews.text: it did take awhile to put together , but is a great table
customer_reviews.author: rbg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kreig products are the top of the line in wood working !! Precision is A+
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: Table and accessories are well made. All of the items exceeded my expectations. Easy to assemble. Don't hesitate, buy it. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: An incredible price and product. Fast shipping and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Consuming Installation
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of something one might purchased from IKEA. I took forever to put together. The box came with a bunch of angle iron pieces, a bunch of screws, nuts, bolts, washers, and other plastic parts. The instructions are difficult to follow. I ended up using the wrong screws to attach the top to the base, and they penetrated the table top. The T-Square style fence is a great concept, but the plastic hardware used to attach it snapped in two when I tried to install it. I am very handy, but this table was an extremely frustrating project. Now that it's put together, I believe it will work fine, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up w/the Triton 3 1/4 HP Router w, the matching plate (Extra), Works like a dream!!!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Good fence but could use a couple of tweaks
customer_reviews.text: This fence is well made overall. The included rods for offset joining are a nice feature. The micro adjuster is plastic and kind of flimsy though and I'm wondering how long the plastic set screws in the locking fence clamp will last.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dech

customer_reviews.title: Large table means lots of working space, as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Large table means lots of working space, as well lots of room to get at the router below the table, too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Router Table
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. It is a very nice router table with a very flat top and a smooth surface. The fence system also works very smoothly and I look forward to many fine projects taking form. I know you can build your own, but I wanted to spend that time on something other than making worskshop tools. There's nothing wrong with that, but it is not my priority.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Router Table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and easy to assemble. Seems very durable with a great finish. The price was excellent for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Jack and Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time to assemble, but once put together it is wonderful. It is nice and sturdy. The kit I purchased had some really useful accessories (loxking wheels, feather board, cabinet switch, etc.. ) Using a Triton router with this table, I see no need for a router lift
customer_reviews.author: Brent Davis

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: way from being a precision router table. the fence movable plates are not aligned
customer_reviews.author: fact

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, put together quite easily. I love kreg products
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great table, but check that multi-track for proper width!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good table, and a huge improvement over the old, clunky Sears router table I had been using for 15 years. I paired this table with an Incra Mastr-Lift II and it makes doing router work a real pleasure. My one complaint (and this only 4 stars) is that the multi-track that came with it was machined incorrectly. The 3/4" miter track was a tiny bit less than 4/3", enough that none of my miter gauges would fit! Called Kreg and told them about it. They sent me a complete new top, with a new multi-track! I only needed the aluminum multi-track bar but not gonna complain about a brand new top aeesmbly.
customer_reviews.author: Anilea O. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The table was perfect. Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The table was perfect. Very good quality. My husband loved it. It did a while to put together, but it was worth every nut and bolt.
customer_reviews.author: AWOLmom4

customer_reviews.title: The stand and top are decent. The insert plate ...
customer_reviews.text: The stand and top are decent. The insert plate I received is not flat- about a 1/16 inch crown in the center which really compromises accuracy. The fence is a little clunky and could be smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC from Kreg
customer_reviews.text: Everything was received and assembled without issue When I was finally set up and ready to start my project, I opened the setup bars to find I'm missing the 1/2" bar and have two 7/16" bars. I wish I would have found this earlier as I ordered it 6 weeks ago and now just discovered this. Horrible quality control by Kreg for the price.
